title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: The marking between the button and the list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up / down can be applied on more than one item. Signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB: The marking between the button and the list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog. The table should have a label to accommodate a mnemonic. Users should be able to select multiple items, as the move up / down functionality can be applied to more than one item. The signature preview should be a label that wraps. The signature preview should have the background color set to the same color as a hover.
